Course pre-requisites can be found [here](https://rawgit.com/andrewcparnell/simms_course/master/Prerequisites.html). All the raw files and code can be found [here](https://github.com/andrewcparnell/simms_course) . Click 'Download ZIP' near the top right if you want an offline copy of everything.
